{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ubee |model=U10C019 |revision=(Ambit) |upc= |ean= |asin=B00274S55O;US; |price= |est_release_date=06/2006 |fcc_date=12/09/2004 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,cable modem |fcc_id=QDS-BRCM1016 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3349;BCM3349KPBG; |cpu1_cspeed=200 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=29LV640BBTC-90G |fla1_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S281632I-UC75 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Broadcom BCM94318MPG |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325M;BCM5325MA2KQMG; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Advanced Direct Conversion Cable Tuner;Broadcom;BCM3419;BCM3419KML;;1; |flags=DOCSIS 2.0 |stock_boot= |stock_os=eCos |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.100.1 |default_user=user |default_pass=user |oui=00:16:CF |oui_eth=00:16:CF |default_ch=6 }} '''Ambit (now Ubee) U10C019 Wireless Cable Modem + 4 Port Wired Router'''
[http://www.ubeeinteractive.com/user-guides/U10C019-U10C020_End_UserGuide_1.6-2009-02-20.pdf User guide] :Manual also applies to the (non-wireless) U10C020
See also [[Ubee U10C020]] ...
